analytics-consent.title: Analytics Consent
analytics-consent.body: We would like to analyze how you use this service, first we want to make sure you are right with it.
analytics-consent.more-info:
First of all highlight that no information would be shared to third parties. We use Matomo, a better alternative to Google Analytics, with this we respect your privacy as much as possible. The following data is collected:
  • IP address: the IP address you access to the web, the last 2 bytes of it are removed. That is 192.168.1.152 becomes 192.168.0.0
  • Browser, OS and screen resolution: this is automatically sent by your browser. With this information we can know what type of device you are using: PC, smartphone, TV, etc.
  • Main browser language: instead of tracking your country using the IP address we use the browser language, we also will consider adding any missing languages to the site.
We use cookies to store some of your preferences. If you wanna know more send me an e-mail.
